feed.title: Ente Auth Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Add new custom icons in auth by @ialexanderbrito in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1981
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1984
  • [auth] Add GMX, Real-Debrid & Surfshark icons by @sv3nnie in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1963
  • [auth] Downgrade to flutter v3.19.3 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1990
  • [auth] Fix existing steam entry handling by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1992

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.0.6...auth-v3.0.7

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.0.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Add icons: DirectAdmin, Hivelocity, Registro.br by @vbenincasa in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2009
  • [auth] Fix handling of no username during bitwarden import by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2010

New Contributors

  • @vbenincasa made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2009

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.0.7...auth-v3.0.8

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.0.12
entry.content:
Release Notes

  • Passkey support for authentication
  • New icons & translations
  • Bug fixes

What's Changed

  • Created instructions to import from most providers by @TomsDex in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2022 ente/pull/2035
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2041
  • [auth] Update download links by @mnvr in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2044
  • [auth] Updated Notesnook icon by @brog-io in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2064
  • [auth] Update windows icon by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2067
  • [auth] Add icons: BitSkins, DMarket, Marketplace.tf & Skinport by @dunny1g in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2055
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2090
  • [auth] Register url scheme for macos by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2107
  • [auth] Bump flutter to 3.22 by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2108
  • [auth] Disable search suggestions and sort tags by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2112
  • [auth] Added multiple custom icons to Ente Auth by @chmromano in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2117
  • [auth] [passkey] Add check status option + other fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2123
  • [auth] Add monochrome icon support for android by @Bl4ckspell7 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2118
  • [auth] Fix twoFas import with missing issuerName by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2133
  • [auth] Fix url scheme for auth windows app by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2134
  • [auth] Bump version to v3.0.11 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2135

New Contributors

  • @TomsDex made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2022
  • @dunny1g made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2055
  • @chmromano made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2117
  • @Bl4ckspell7 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2118

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.0.8...auth-v3.0.12

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.0.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Auth] Passkey fix for linux by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2154
  • Added coindcx icon by @nikunjkumarnakum in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2148
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2185
  • [auth] Sync on app resume by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.0.12...auth-v3.0.13

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.0.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FEAT] Auth goodies for linux by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2255
  • Warning about icon sizes and instructions on matching the icon to the issuer. by @vbenincasa in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2240
  • [FIX] Bundle Metainfo and Bump version by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2256
  • [FIX(auth)] Run pacman build on beta, fix deps by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2257
  • [auth] Update logs by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2258
  • FIX(auth) also move the pacman build to artifacts by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2259
  • [auth] Fix keyboard pop up when autofocus is turned on by @klaas0 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2232
  • [auth] Optimize and reduce filesize by @vbenincasa in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2229, https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2228, https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2227,https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2244,https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2243
  • Maximize icon compatibility by @vbenincasa in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2226,https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2242
  • [auth] Add new and updates custom icons in auth by @ialexanderbrito in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2157
  • [auth] Show contact support option on error by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2238
  • Bump version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2239
  • [auth] Potential fix for invalid handshake error on Windows by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2247
  • [auth] Lint fix by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2248

New Contributors

  • @klaas0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.0.13...auth-v3.0.17
